::DrillBit::

DrillBit saw Triceradon heading for him.
"Beast mode!" He transformed, and drilled under ground, and came up
behind hes attacker.
"DrillBit, MAXIMIZE!" He transformes, and attempts to stick his drill,
right up Triceradon's a$$.
